cast.overview: When a visionary architect and his wife flee post-war Europe in 1947 to rebuild their legacy and witness the birth of modern United States, their lives are changed forever by a mysterious, wealthy client.
cast.title: The Brutalist

also_known_as: ステイシー・マーティン
details.biography:
Stacy Martin (born 20 March 1990) is a French actress. Her breakthrough role was playing Joe as a young woman in Lars von Trier's 2013 drama film Nymphomaniac. Other credits include The Childhood of a Leader (2015), All the Money in the World (2017), Amanda (2018), The Evening Hour (2020), Lovers (2020), and The Serpent (2021).

Description above from the Wikipedia article Stacy Martin, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Stacy Martin
